sqlMap.sql: delete from LNSBILLPLAN where ACCTNO = :acctno and BRC = :brc and BILLTYPE = :billtype and PERIOD = :period

insert into LNSBILLPLAN (ACCTNO, BRC, BILLTYPE, PERIOD, TRANDATE, SERSEQNO, TXSEQ, BILLAMT, PRINBAL, BEGINDATE, ENDDATE, REPAYEDATE, TIMESTAMP) values (:acctno, :brc, :billtype, :period, :trandate, :serseqno, :txseq, :billamt, :prinbal, :begindate, :enddate, :repayedate, current timestamp)

update LNSBILLPLAN set TRANDATE = :trandate, SERSEQNO = :serseqno, TXSEQ = :txseq, BILLAMT = :billamt, PRINBAL = :prinbal, BEGINDATE = :begindate, ENDDATE = :enddate, REPAYEDATE = :repayedate, TIMESTAMP = current timestamp where ACCTNO = :acctno and BRC = :brc and BILLTYPE = :billtype and PERIOD = :period

select ACCTNO, BRC, BILLTYPE, PERIOD, TRANDATE, SERSEQNO, TXSEQ, BILLAMT, PRINBAL, BEGINDATE, ENDDATE, REPAYEDATE, TIMESTAMP from LNSBILLPLAN where ACCTNO = :acctno and BRC = :brc and BILLTYPE = :billtype and PERIOD = :period
